    • Method Detail

      • fillArrayList

        public static void fillArrayList​(Scanner fin,
                                 ArrayList<Movie> theMovies)
        The fill array list method reads a movie one line at a time from the file and creates a movie object
        Look at movies.txt file the information about a movie on separate lines
        Parameters:
        fin - Representing a Scanner object that has wrappered a File object
        theMovies - Representing an array list of movie objects
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the scanner or arraylist are null with the message Bad Params fillArrayList
        NOTE: The scanner input buffer is left empty and the array list is trimmed to size
        Below is the file order (movies.txt)
        movie name
        movie genre
        movie studio name
        movie studio owner
        major studio unit
        movie running time

      • buildMovie

        public static Movie buildMovie​(Scanner kb)
        The build movie method prompts the user to enter movie information, and builds the appropriate movie object You must build a movie studio object before you build a movie object. The movie studio object will be passed to the constructor to build a movie object.
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing a valid Scanner object
        Returns:
        Movie Representing a fully created movie object
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null with the string Bad Param build Movie
        POSTCONDITION: The input buffer is left empty

      • findGenre

        private static String findGenre​(String genre)
        This private method receives a string and returns the appropriate matching string of the enumerated type
        Parameters:
        genre - Representing the string to be converted to an enumerated constant
        Returns:
        String Representing the constant value as a capitalized String.
        For example the user enters action the method would return AC.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the string passed in is null or empty
        NoSuchElementException - if the genre string is not found in the array of MovieGenre -- uses values

      • menu

        public static int menu​(Scanner kb)
        The menu method written by me you don't have to write anything
        Parameters:
        kb - Representing a valid scanner object
        Returns:
        int Representing a menu choice in range
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if kb is null
        POSTCONDITION: Leaves the input buffer empty

      • printMovies

        public static void printMovies​(PrintStream fout,
                               ArrayList<Movie> theMovies)
        Print movies is provided by me nothing for you to write
        Parameters:
        fout - Representing a PrintStream object
        theMovies - Representing the array list of movies
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if fout is null or the movies is null
